Name: PerfectLover
About the game: In PerfectLover, there are three girls for players to choose from. Reika, Saori, Shiori Important: All characters are over the age of 18 They have different personalities and wait for the players to unlock everything about them. Each round represents the past of the day They have a physiological period, a dangerous period and a sexual desire If they do not take safety measures, they will be pregnant. In each round, if the players have met their needs Will enhance the heroine's level of affection for the player Improve your sensibility to unlock more items, including Position, clothing, accessories and textures The current level limit is up to 24, etc.
